bibl.title: The Architecture of Petra. (British Academy Monographs in Archaeology. 1.)
bibl.note: Voir pp. 61-104 et pll. 174-218: IV. The Architectural Remains from Alexandria and their Chronology; - V. The Architecture of Alexandria and its Reflection in the Architecture at Petra and in Second Style Pompeian Wall-painting.
McKENZIE Judith, The Architecture of Petra. (British Academy Monographs in Archaeology. 1.)
Oxford, University Press, 1990, 4°, xxii-209 pp., 20 diagrammes et 9 cartes et 245 pll. ISBN 0-19-727000-X. £55.
